entry.title: Severe Drought Hits South America
entry.content: A shortage of rainfall has left parts of South America in drought, hindering a huge hydroelectric dam in Paraguay and impeding the river transport of goods.

entry.title: Does Taiwan's Military Ready for War? Few Think So
entry.content: Poor preparation and low morale are pressing concerns for Taiwanâ€™s armed forces. One conscript said his basic training mainly involved sweeping leaves, moving spare tires and pulling weeds.
